page.title: 13" OUR COMMUNITY POLICEMAN "
page.content: Our community policeman,{P.C. Les {Gardner,}has been working for fifteen years. His job is to walk around a certain area making sure that people are behaving properly. He is also there to help people who have problems, such as being lost. {"The most serious crime in this area {is burglary," says Les,"but we like to {think that we can prevent a lot more {crime these days thanks to our new {technology. I am in constant {communication with the police station {by walkie-talkie." {P.C. Gardner's}"beat" covers about 5 square miles in the Whitefield area of Bury. He is thirty-five years old and is married with a family. {Selected from interviews by Junior 4 {children from Hollins Grundy C.P.
